title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-6.2 - Responsibility of installers and repairers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 4-6.2 - Responsibility of installers and repairers

State Regulations

All persons in charge of the work of installing, repairing, reassembling or replacing boilers or components shall use due care
to have the work done in a neat, workmanlike and safe manner. Patch and welding
repairs shall be performed in accordance with Subpart 14-3 of Industrial Code

Rule 14. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
§§
4-6.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
